author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL  AMERICA...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL  AMERICA...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Wed Nov 1
 the center of Pilar was located near 12.0, -89.6
 with movement NW at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
